title: A day spent on a Swagway X1 is genius
text:
A day spent on a Swagway X1 is genius 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Mashable's Sam Sheffer spent an entire day rolling around Mashable HQ on a Swagway scooter (often called a "hoverboard"). By the end of the ...
